Question Type: PP describe new rights afforded California residen...
Question Text: PP describe new rights afforded California residents. (The description should address all of the above new rights. It should also indicate that the consumer may only make a personal information request twice in a 12-month period, that the business will need to collect information from the requesting party so that it can verify their identity, and that the business will respond within 45 days of receiving a personal information request.

Question Type: PP describe new rights afforded California residen...
Question Text: PP describe new rights afforded California residents. (The description should address all of the above new rights. It should also indicate that the consumer may only make a personal information request twice in a 12-month period, that the business will need to collect information from the requesting party so that it can verify their identity, and that the business will respond within 45 days of receiving a personal information request.
